explanations.machine learning: The paper discusses predictive models for forecasting COVID-19 cases, which involves machine learning techniques.
explanations.regression: The paper mentions the use of linear regression and polynomial regression as part of the predictive models.
explanations.neural network: The paper employs recurrent neural networks (RNN) and other neural network-based models for forecasting.
explanations.deep learning: The paper uses deep learning models such as LSTM and GRU for predictive analytics.
explanations.recurrent neural network: The paper explicitly mentions the use of RNN as one of the state-of-the-art models for comparison.
explanations.long short-term memory: The paper uses LSTM models and discusses their performance in forecasting COVID-19 cases.
explanations.LSTM: The paper focuses on stacked LSTM-GRU models and compares their performance with other models.
